text: Boris von Raukov is Valmir's eighth son. He left Ostland to pursue a military career. He is currently the captain of the 4th Nuln Halberdiers, a mercenary regiment based in the city of Nuln, who fought alongside the Grudgebringers.
Renowned Captain of the Carroburg Greatswords Regiment
Renowned Captain of the Helmgart Bowmen from Helmgart Fortress
Founder and commander of the mercenary company called the Grudgebringers, named after Morgan's magic sword Grudgebringer.
Visit this area to hire Leitdorf's 9th Crossbows
Renowned Captain of Leitdorf's 9th Crossbows from Averland
These mercenaries are highly experienced and proficient fighters.

His regimental patron is Marius Leitdorf, the "Mad" Elector Count of Averland. Like many of Averland's regiments, the 9th Crossbows regularly guard the entrance to Black Fire Pass, route through the Black Mountains.
Renowned Captain of Leitdorf's 9th Crossbows from Averland

These multi-barrelled cannons are part of the Emperor's personal army.

These mercenaries are highly experienced and proficient fighters.
The Reiksguard Order comprises an elite core of well-trained and well-equipped troops loyal to the Emperor who fight on his behalf.
Renowned Captain of the Reiksguard Knights

These dwarven warriors are Engrol Goldtongue's personal bodyguards. He is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar.
